summary: Of the surviving Game of Thrones main characters from season one, all of them have gone through tremendous loss. All of them...
body:
Of the surviving Game of Thrones main characters from season one, all of them have gone through tremendous loss. All of them have been ridiculed in some way. They have been stripped of their identities and now rise from the ashes reborn.

Jon was born a bastard, and no one ever let him forget that fact. Still, he put his heart and soul into the Night’s Watch, rising above his circumstances–only to be betrayed by his own men. He is literally reborn and rises to King of the North. Soon, he will discover his true name. From a bastard to a dragon king.

Daenerys was born a woman and the younger sister to a cruel older brother with ambitions for the throne. She is used and sold into marriage to the Dothraki as a way of buying her brother an army. Yet in the end, she casts away her brother, and is reborn in the fire with three dragons. She has claimed her name and birthright. From a slave to a conqueror.

Sansa is born a woman, and quickly becomes a prisoner when she loses almost all of her family. She is passed around from marriage to marriage, family to family, name to name. Until at long last she helps to destroy her abuser and reclaims her home and her name. From a naive girl to the Queen in the North.

Arya is born the second sister of a noble family, with ambitions to be a warrior in a world that refuses such a path to women. Every attempt to reunite with her family is met with disaster. Across the narrow sea, she finally pursues life as a killer, but at the expense of her identity. Ultimately she reclaims the name Arya Stark. From a young girl to an experienced killer, able to protect her family.

Bran is born well, but loses the use of his legs, and therefore his dreams of becoming a knight, at the age of ten. However, he begins to recieve new dreams, and through great loss, he too is reborn as the three eyed raven. From a crippled boy to the most powerful green seer.

Tyrion is born a dwarf, hated by his father, given power only when his father allows it. However, when he kills his father, through a journey across the sea, he finally becomes the hand of a ruler–this time on his own terms. From a dwarf to the Hand of the Queen

Jaime is born the golden son to a great family. He should have everything. But once he kills king Aerys, he becomes known as the Kingslayer and everyone treats him as a man without honor. He wears his sword and his reputation as a killer like a suit of armor. As his identity. He loses that identity when he loses his right hand. Through such loss, Jaime must learn to be a better man and eventually he is able to leave his sister and become who he was born to be. From Kingslayer to Oathkeeper

Cersei is born a woman to a powerful family. She becomes queen through marriage and lives paranoid of her enemies. She loses all three of her children. She loses her fathers. Her brothers turn away from her cruelty. But she has become a queen along the way. The mad queen.

All of these characters have come so far and they have a further to go. Not all will survive the winter. But it’s significant that Game of Thrones is a story about the powerless coming to power and being reborn through suffering. That is why so many people connect with it. Not the battles or the dragons. The characters.

I am so looking forward to seeing out it all ends.

summary: Fly Away - IncompleteSentanc (Erava) - A Song of Ice and Fire & Related Fandoms [Archive of Our Own]
title: Fly Away - IncompleteSentanc (Erava) - A Song of Ice and Fire & Related Fandoms [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description: “Sansa Stark was markedly different from her siblings. From the first words she spoke until her last, she was undeniably strange. Jon knows it better than anyone - he was there when she spoke her first.”

Jon bent the knee afrer Dany accepted to help him. DANY asked him too “ I hope that i deserve it”

Jo : You do

2) Jon sleep qith Dany because he need to control her

Dany accepted to sail with him in the noth and didn’t heard her advisors. She and Jon are some position. JON doesn’t need her manipulation

Hy? She try to connect with her worst enemy (Cersei)because of people and forgot her pride

Jon doesn’t need to lie Dany . BECAUSE after all she accepted him about everything.

“You are not like everyone else ”

she is a special woman and Jon knows that

summary: I could have easily have been convinced of the love story of all time (#Jonerys) if, only if, Jon had looked at Dany the way he...
body: I could have easily have been convinced of the love story of all time (#Jonerys) if, only if, Jon had looked at Dany the way he looked at Drogon on Dragonstone. Just once in season 7 and I would have been a strong believer… look at that man falling in love…with a dragon… a REAL dragon…

reblog.comment: I could have easily have been convinced of the love story of all time (#Jonerys) if, only if, Jon had looked at Dany the way he looked at Drogon on Dragonstone. Just once in season 7 and I would have been a strong believer… look at that man falling in love…with a dragon… a REAL dragon…

summary: Yeah Jon will betray Dany ... stay in your dream guys 😂😂😂 great argument if he didn't  bend the knee she will kill him 😂😂😂Oh if...
body:
Yeah Jon will betray Dany … stay in your dream guys 😂😂😂 great argument if he didn’t bend the knee she will kill him 😂😂😂Oh if I remember

Jon bend the knee after Dany accepted to protect North and defeat NK…

If I remember right He went with Dany after she accepted to help him and sail with him

Peersons who think that Jon is a traitor and sleep with woman for lie …they don’t know his character… Just stay in your dreams…. Yeah Em said that she fucked final of Dany because she is everything there . SHE is a fire who will defeat NK … Princes who was promised …because of that Missandei translated this word especially last season…That’s the bigest paralel in book where Maister Aemon talks about Daenerys.

SHE IS A LAST HOPE WHO WE HAVE. TELL THEM …SHE IS ALONE…SHE NEEDS PROTECT

Sansa isn’t main character in this history . Here is 5 main character who made everything in future. Sansa is not a main character . Her importancy isn’t like those another.

Everything what happened on the wall and Targaryen’s daughter another continent is title “Song of Ice and Fire

…This is a authors word. DANY is a FIRE in this story. Her importancy is bigest and she has her role in last war like Jon . ESPECIALLY Sansa isn’t a heir of North. HEIR OF NORTH IS JON. Her brother THE LAST KING IN RHE NORTH decided that and lady Catelyn confirmed that. Sansa is annuled from the North by her own brother she will never become a heir of North . Just stop dreaming… guys …


Targaryen alone is the most terrible thing

Every dragon needs his another dragon . Wo can love dragon again? …of course only another dragon . Jon will never betray woman especially Dany who risked her life and her children for him. One and only person who risked her life for him… one and only person who never interested who he is …bstard or king…she never called him Bastard

I wil merry with prince , not a badtard -Said Sansa. She said this words with hateful

Dany loved him like Bastard nok a king. And that’s the most important detail in this story, that Dany especially met him like bastard not a prince…. Dany met Jon before he understands his real parentage. THIS IS THE MOST IMPORTANT THING. Jon looked her real face who she is. She can to love him personality not his titles…different his lovely sister who always thinks about titles . Because of that she try to married with Joffry….oh become a queen is one and only what Sansa need, because of that she told everything Cersei and every northern solider was dead in KL and her father becomes a Prisoner . Not forgat that in Dany’s side is two person ( Tyrion and Varys) who knows about Sansas past . She traits her father and told everything Cersei. Both of them knows about this fact…and Arya and Jon don’t know this detail 😂😂😂

Jon isn’t a traitor especially with woman…And if you think that this way which Jon looked Dany isn’t a love …You don’t know nothing about love 😂😂😂

Jon will never betray woman . Because of that he never slept with woman in past . He always wanted to be woman who he love. Not for play with her.

They will come and see whonyou are .

Said Jon to Dany. There is fact how he adored her. Her heart and her personality . Her Warior queen who tried to save his life . Jon’s hears was broken when he looked Dany’s face when Viseryon fall down from the sky.

dany will become mother of his child 😍😍Dany is woman who he deserves 😍😍 Their foreshadow is unbelievable in show and especially in book more and more romantic and sweet 😍😍

Her brother THE LAST KING IN RHE NORTH decided that and lady Catelyn confirmed that. Sansa is annuled from the North by her own brother she will never become a heir of North . Just stop dreaming… guys …


Targaryen alone is the most terrible thing

Every dragon needs his another dragon . Wo can love dragon again? …of course only another dragon . Jon will never betray woman especially Dany who risked her life and her children for him. One and only person who risked her life for him… one and only person who never interested who he is …bstard or king…she never called him Bastard

I wil merry with prince , not a badtard -Said Sansa. She said this words with hateful

Dany loved him like Bastard nok a king. And that’s the most important detail in this story, that Dany especially met him like bastard not a prince…. Dany met Jon before he understands his real parentage. THIS IS THE MOST IMPORTANT THING. Jon looked her real face who she is. She can to love him personality not his titles…different his lovely sister who always thinks about titles . Because of that she try to married with Joffry….oh become a queen is one and only what Sansa need, because of that she told everything Cersei and every northern solider was dead in KL and her father becomes a Prisoner . Not forgat that in Dany’s side is two person ( Tyrion and Varys) who knows about Sansas past . She traits her father and told everything Cersei. Both of them knows about this fact…and Arya and Jon don’t know this detail 😂😂😂

Jon isn’t a traitor especially with woman…And if you think that this way which Jon looked Dany isn’t a love …You don’t know nothing about love 😂😂😂

Jon will never betray woman . Because of that he never slept with woman in past . He always wanted to be woman who he love. Not for play with her.

They will come and see whonyou are .

Said Jon to Dany. There is fact how he adored her. Her heart and her personality . Her Warior queen who tried to save his life . Jon’s hears was broken when he looked Dany’s face when Viseryon fall down from the sky.

dany will become mother of his child 😍😍Dany is woman who he deserves 😍😍 Their foreshadow is unbelievable in show and especially in book more and more romantic and sweet 😍😍

Yeah Jon will betray Dany … stay in your dream guys 😂😂😂 great argument if he didn’t bend the knee she will kill him 😂😂😂Oh if I remember

Jon bend the knee after Dany accepted to protect North and defeat NK…

If I remember right He went with Dany after she accepted to help him and sail with him

blog.name: incorrect-got-quotes
blog.title: Dead, almost like my interest in the show
blog.description: I post quotes when I feel like it. Mostly nowadays I don’t.If you want to use one of the quotes as a story or drawing prompt, I'm fine with that, as long as you credit me in your story or art. Also, tag any drawings under #oberyn’s saucy art. Yes, I am in fact Oberyn Martell. For those on mobile, here is my ship list: https://incorrect-got-quotes.tumblr.com/list-of-ships Main: garnetislovegarnetislife. SUBMISSION BOX IS (MOST LIKELY) PERMANENTLY CLOSED!

summary: Jon, as a kid: Despite my best efforts, the Night’s Watch rejected my application letter three times. Each letter said the same...
body: Jon, as a kid: Despite my best efforts, the Night’s Watch rejected my application letter three times. Each letter said the same thing: “We thank you for your interest, but you’re 8.”

reblog.comment: Jon, as a kid: Despite my best efforts, the Night’s Watch rejected my application letter three times. Each letter said the same thing: “We thank you for your interest, but you’re 8.”

summary: Bran and Sam don’t tell Jon who his parents are. (For whatever reason, one of them dies before they can, Jon dies, they think it...
body:
What if, hear me out….

Bran and Sam don’t tell Jon who his parents are. (For whatever reason, one of them dies before they can, Jon dies, they think it will fuck things up politically idfk) I think it would honestly break my heart. That poor boy only wants family of his own. Don’t take that away from him.

reblog.comment:

Bran and Sam don’t tell Jon who his parents are. (For whatever reason, one of them dies before they can, Jon dies, they think it will fuck things up politically idfk) I think it would honestly break my heart. That poor boy only wants family of his own. Don’t take that away from him.

blog.name: sansasnowstark
blog.title: Fangirl ForLife
blog.description: jiya | 22 | Virgo | Kashmiri | icon by @sizzlinbaconpeach | I joined tumblr solely to obsess over ships and Taylor Swift but now I reblog random stuff too | Current Ship Obsessions : Jonsa, Gendrya, Bellarke, Klaroline, Steroline, Stydia, Barchie, Peraltiago, Sherlolly, Braime, Hinny , Drinny, Romione, Cosimo x Contessina, All Skam ships, & the list goes on....

tags: i know i know.... i totally cheated and added house stark videos in there
also the links were not working in the ask so i had to make a seperate post.
summary: Hi there! @sansastarkofwinterhell  Okay so here are some of my favourites… in no particular order (though if if I had to choose...
body:
Hi there! @sansastarkofwinterhell Okay so here are some of my favourites… in no particular order (though if if I had to choose then I’ll pick the top 5 and the bonus videos lol 😅).

House Stark || Legacy - This one is more house Stark centric but does a great job of showing how Jon and Sansa are the future of house Stark (cuz they will continue the stark line 😉😉). I count this as a jonsa video but overall it’s rather Stark centric. (Love the book quotes in this one)

Jon / Sansa ; Counting Paths - One of the best jonsa fan videos out there, period! I won’t say anything this one speaks for itself. Get ready for goosebumps. ❤

Jon & Sansa | Numb - One of my favourites!! All their iconic moments compressed under 3 minutes while there’s violin in the background… it’s really good. 👌

Jon & Sansa // How rare and beautiful - just heart melting, really nice video. 😭😍

Jon & Sansa | Strange Birds - This one is by the Annesoshi one of the best… goosebumps ensured. 😍

Jon & Sansa | Kings landing AU - as it suggests it’s an au. 👌

Ned & Catelyn | Jon & Sansa || Somebody To Die For - NedCat paralells… do I have to say more! ❤😭

Jon and Sansa | My Cousin Sansa - Adding this for that bath scene idk how the person edited it in but it looks good. Plus all those dialogues… like damn! 🔥😍

We don’t get to Choose who we Love - By Annesoshi. A masterpiece… it’s got jonsa along with other Got ships like NedCat, Sam Gilly, TalisaRobb, Gendrya and it’s top notch stuff. 😭😭

Jon and Sansa | Northern Lights - some say it’s the best. ❤

Mirrors (Sansa and Jon) - This video and with the lyrics always gets me. 😍😭

Jon & Sansa | Hold On - my feels 😭😍

trust each other ; Jon and Sansa - just a really lovely video tbh. ❤

Jon & Sansa || See You Again - the lyrics and their scenes and my heart melts. 💕

Jon & Sansa | Who Am I darling to you? - just a smol feel good video.

Jon and Sansa | Opening credits (Outlander Style) - Self explanatory. Lol 😅

Jon and Sansa | “ What do You want that you do not have?” - focusing on why Jon and Sansa weren’t happy in s7 (could it be because they missed each other?) ❤

+ BONUS VIDEOS

Jon gets mad at all the men who mention Sansa - This hilarious video of Jon Snow turning into an angry kitten whenever a dude so much as utters Sansa’s name as kill Bill sirens start. 😂😂😂

Bran, Arya, Sansa, Jon | Home - more house Stark centric but I love the dialogues compilation and the focus on the Pack and their connection to winterfell n each other. Might make you cry. 😭😭

House Stark | Comes and Goes - again has jonsa moments near the end but overall is a house stark tribute video… the reason i am sharing this is because it’s a legit masterpiece and I will share it because everyone should watch it!!! Will legit make you weep 😭😭😭

Ps. Jonsa fam feel free to add more videos to the list!!

tags: This is from the first poetry book I read
summary: What is poetry? you ask, while fixing your blue pupil on mine. What is poetry! And you are asking me? Poetry… is you. —Rhyme XXI...
caption:
What is poetry? you ask, while fixing
your blue pupil on mine.
What is poetry! And you are asking me?
Poetry… is you.

—Rhyme XXI by Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer

reblog.comment:

your blue pupil on mine.
What is poetry! And you are asking me?
Poetry… is you.

—Rhyme XXI by Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer

your blue pupil on mine.

Poetry… is you.

—Rhyme XXI by Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer
